H0.text: what is the number of basic units in the international system of units. Three

H1.text: what is the number of basic units in the international system of units. Five

H2.text: what is the number of basic units in the international system of units. Eight

H3.text: what is the number of basic units in the international system of units. seven

A4.text: Prior to its redefinition in 2019, the SI was defined through the seven base units from which the derived units were constructed as products of powers of the base units.

A5.text: The SI comprises a coherent system of units of measurement starting with seven base units.
